mapper.select:
select pm.painting_id as paintingId, pm.painting_code as paintingCode, pm.painting_name as paintingName, pm.authoer, pm.year_of_manufacture as year_of_Manufacture,
pi.save_name as saveName
from painting_mst pm left outer join painting_image pi on(pi.painting_code = pm.painting_code) where 1 = 1
and (pm.painting_name like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') or pm.author like concat ('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or pm.year_of_manufacture like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%'))
limit #{index}, #{count};
